metadata.title: CVE-2023-41038

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP5

metadata.description: Firebird is a relational database. Versions 4.0.0 through 4.0.3 and version 5.0 beta1 are vulnerable to a server crash when a user uses a specific form of SET BIND statement. Any non-privileged user with minimum access to a server may type a statement with a long `CHAR` length, which causes the server to crash due to stack corruption. Versions 4.0.4.2981 and 5.0.0.117 contain fixes for this issue. No known workarounds are available.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP5 is installed
